thread.title: Red Cross Has Only Built Six Homes in Haiti
thread.title_full: Red Cross Has Only Built Six Homes in Haiti

author: Gordy
title: Red Cross Has Only Built Six Homes in Haiti
text: Posts: 615 Red Cross Has Only Built Six Homes in Haiti Red Cross Built Exactly 6 Homes For Haiti With Nearly Half A Billion Dollars In Donations This is more proof that charity does nothing for poor and oppressed people and just keeps them pacified and in a state of dysfunction. This is what liberals need to understand. Welfare and charity are not a part of the solution, they just mask the real problem. Quote: Originally Posted by Gordy Red Cross Built Exactly 6 Homes For Haiti With Nearly Half A Billion Dollars In Donations This is more proof that charity does nothing for poor and oppressed people and just keeps them pacified and in a state of dysfunction. This is what liberals need to understand. Welfare and charity are not a part of the solution, they just mask the real problem. I read somewhere some time ago that if you donate $10 to any charity fund, only one dollar goes to help. Nine dollars is ate up by the charity staff and transportation costs. Bribes also have to be paid to government officials in Haiti.
